etymology.description: 宀(宀) (mián, "roof") + 木(木) (mù, "wood") = dwelling, home -> name of dynasty/surname
etymology.interpretation: The character 宋(Sòng) combines 宀(宀) (mián, "roof"), conveying the idea of a shelter or dwelling, with 木(木) (mù, "wood"), serving as the phonetic element. Over time, this meaning expanded from 'home' to represent the Song dynasty, becoming a widely recognized surname.

examples.chinese: 宋朝是中国历史上一个辉煌的朝代(宋朝是中國歷史上一個輝煌的朝代)。
examples.pinyin: Sòng cháo shì Zhōngguó lìshǐ shàng yí gè huīhuáng de cháodài.
examples.english: The Song Dynasty is a brilliant dynasty in Chinese history.

examples.chinese: 他姓宋(他姓宋)，家族历史悠久(家族歷史悠久)。
examples.pinyin: Tā xìng Sòng, jiāzú lìshǐ yōujiǔ.
examples.english: His surname is Song, and his family has a long history.
